name: Daryl F. Gates' Police Quest: SWAT
name_original: Daryl F. Gates' Police Quest: SWAT
description:
Daryl F. Gates' Police Quest: SWAT is an adventure-arcade game developed by Sierra On-Line. It came out on 01-01-1995. Sierra On-Line published the game.
Daryl F. Gates' Police Quest: SWAT is available on PC.
It was produced by Phy Williams and Tammy Dargan. It was directed by Tammy Dargan. It was scored by Dan Kehler.
